name: World Of Blocks
description:
Welcome to World Of Blocks, an exciting construction game that offers the freedom to create anything you can imagine.

In this limitless sandbox world, you are in control, equipped with a wide variety of shapes and objects to bring your ideas to life. With World Of Blocks, your imagination knows no bounds. Create magnificent structures, landscapes, and intricate designs using a vast selection of building elements. The only limit is your creativity.

Access a rich library of shapes and objects to build your dream world.

Import your own textures into the game with our simplified import system.


World Of Blocks is not just a block-building game, our game offers a library of assets that can be inserted into the game.

Remember that World Of Blocks is still in development, and we will be introducing more content and features in future updates. We invite you to join us on this creative journey, where the sky's the limit, and your imagination is your greatest asset.

Get ready to build and enjoy the ultimate sandbox experience in World Of Blocks!
